item.title: Sam Curran's Unbelievable Performance Seals Victory as Death-Bowling Shines
item.description: Sam Curran's exceptional death-bowling leads his team to a thrilling victory, showcasing the importance of closing out matches effectively.

item.title: Suryakumar's 84* Helps India Overcome USA Scare in T20 Clash
item.description: Suryakumar Yadav's unbeaten 84 led India to a hard-fought victory against the USA in a thrilling T20 match.
